description: Dialogue templates for NPCs integrated with AIDialogueSystem personality traits

greeting_variants.text: Hey there, pilot! Great to see you again! Got a minute to chat?
Welcome! You must be {player_name}. I've heard good things about you!
What do you want? Make it quick.
Greetings, pilot. I require your assistance with a matter of some importance.
Oh! Um, h-hello. I... I need help with something. If you're not too busy, that is...
Well, well! If it isn't my favorite pilot! Or at least top five. I keep a list.
You. You look like someone who knows how to make credits. I've got a job that pays well.

mission_offers.text: I need someone to {mission_objective}. The pay is {credit_amount} credits. Interested?
There's a... situation that needs handling. Let's just say it's worth your time. Details upon acceptance.
Please, I'm begging you! I need help with {mission_objective}. I'll pay whatever I can - {credit_amount} credits!
So, funny story... I need someone to {mission_objective}. Think you could help a friend out? There's {credit_amount} credits in it for you.
Listen up. You're going to {mission_objective}. Do this right and you'll get {credit_amount} credits. Screw it up and... well, don't screw it up.

mission_acceptance.text: Excellent. I'll transmit the coordinates and mission details to your ship's computer. Report back upon completion.
Awesome! I knew I could count on you. Details are uploading to your ship now. Good luck out there!
Oh thank goodness! You have no idea how much this means to me. I'm sending you everything you need right now.
Good. Don't talk to anyone about this. The details are encrypted - your eyes only. Now get going.

mission_completion.text: Perfect work, pilot. Your payment has been transferred. I'll keep you in mind for future opportunities.
You did it! That's exactly what we needed! Here's your payment, plus a little bonus. You've earned it!
I... I can't thank you enough. The credits are yours, every last one. You're a lifesaver!
Yeah, yeah, good work. Here's your cut. Now if you'll excuse me, I have business to attend to.
Ha! Knew you'd pull it off! Here's your payment, hot off the digital press. Pleasure doing business with you!

station_chatter.text: Did you hear about the convoy that got hit near the asteroid belt? Pirates are getting bolder.
They say someone found an alien artifact out in the frontier. Corporate's offering big money for it.
Fuel prices are through the roof again. How are we supposed to make a living out here?
Avoid sector 7-G if you can. Some kind of anomaly out there is messing with navigation systems.
Mining guild is looking for escorts. Pays decent if you don't mind some potential pirate action.

player_reputation_reactions.text: Hey, you're {player_name}! I've heard about your work. Top-notch stuff!
So you're the famous {player_name}. Hope you're as good as they say.
You've got some nerve showing your face around here after what you've done.
I'd watch my back if I were you. Not everyone's happy with your recent choices.

basic_controls.text: Welcome to your ship, pilot. Let's start with the basics. Look at your hands - you'll use these to interact with everything.
Good! Now try grabbing the throttle lever. Close your hand when you're near it.
Excellent work! You're getting the hang of it. Let's move on to flight controls.
Not quite. Remember, you need to be close to the object before grabbing. Try again.

flight_training.text: Time to take her for a spin. Grab the flight stick and gently push forward to increase throttle.
Now try some basic maneuvers. Pull the stick left or right to roll, up or down to pitch.
Pro tip: Smooth, controlled movements work better than jerky inputs, especially in VR.

combat_training.text: Let's talk weapons. Your ship is equipped with basic lasers. Target the practice drone ahead.
Target locked! Now squeeze the fire trigger. Short, controlled bursts are more accurate.
Good shooting! But combat isn't just offense. Watch your shield indicator - manage your energy wisely.

system_status.text: Systems online. All primary functions nominal. Welcome aboard, Commander.
Warning: Shield integrity at 30 percent. Recommend immediate evasive action.
Critical alert: Hull breach detected. Emergency protocols engaged.

navigation.text: Waypoint set. Estimated time to arrival: {eta} minutes.
Approaching destination. Reducing speed to approach velocity.
Navigational hazard detected ahead. Recommend course correction.

combat_alerts.text: Hostile contact detected. Threat level: {threat_level}. Weapons hot.
All hostiles neutralized. Combat systems standing down.

contextual_hints.text: Approach the docking bay slowly. Line up with the guidance markers for a smooth landing.
Hold steady while scanning. Movement will interrupt the scan process.
Fuel running low. Consider refueling at the nearest station or using a fuel scoop.
Cargo hold is full. You'll need to sell or store items before collecting more.

personality_trait_ranges.description: Personality trait values from AIDialogueSystem (0-100 scale)

traits.aggressiveness: How confrontational and forceful the NPC is
traits.friendliness: How warm and welcoming the NPC is
traits.honesty: How truthful and straightforward the NPC is
traits.nervousness: How anxious and uncertain the NPC appears
traits.professionalism: How formal and business-like the NPC is
traits.humor: How often the NPC uses jokes and levity
traits.greed: How money-focused and self-interested the NPC is
traits.loyalty: How trustworthy and faithful the NPC is
